title: Polki & Ruby Guluband Haaram - A Timeless Fusion of Tradition and Modernity
features: A stunning Guluband-style Haaram featuring a geometric arrangement of Polki diamonds set in open settings to maximize brilliance. Adorned with vibrant ruby floral motifs, each centered with a smaller diamond. Delicate diamond-encrusted border frames each Polki and ruby element. The reverse showcases intricate filigree work. Handcrafted by skilled artisans using traditional Telugu jewelry techniques.
occasions: and high-end social gatherings. A beautiful statement piece for Seemantham or half-saree functions when paired with traditional attire.
description: This exquisite Haaram seamlessly blends the timeless appeal of Polki diamonds with the vibrancy of rubies. The contemporary design is a versatile choice for both traditional and modern outfits. Crafted with exceptional attention to detail, ensuring heirloom quality and lasting beauty. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, adding to its regal charm. A unique and rare piece that will undoubtedly become a cherished possession.
